McAfee Threat Intelligence (TIE) DXL Python Client Library

This distribution contains following directories:

  • doc
    • Documentation for the TIE DXL Python client library
  • lib
    • TIE DXL Python client libraries (.zip, .egg, .whl)
  • sample
    • Samples that demonstrate use of the TIE DXL Python client library

Click here to view the documentation which includes installation instructions, TIE DXL Python client library details, and samples.
